content: There is a US eReferral iGuide that has been in development over the past few years, that I cannot seem to track down. It went through a draft review process late last year I think. Would somebody be able to help me find that page?

Craig Newman said:

Do you mean Bidirectional Services eReferral (BSeR)? http://hl7.org/fhir/us/bser/

that's the one thanks!
